page.title: 18PLAYTIME GAMES
page.content:
At school we have two{playtimes}and this is one of the games we play.It is called{"Polo"},this is the way we play it. A person stands at the front and then there is a person called the messenger.He goes to the person in front and he says to the messenger{ {"Flowers"}or something else. Then the messenger goes to the three people and tells them what it is. The messenger calls to the person in front who calls out{"A flower"}and the person who chooses that flower runs and so does the person in front.The one who gets back to his place first shouts out { {"Polo"}and he wins.
{Bruce Age 6 Years {
